## AppModule.getAllModuleMetadata() method

Method to get a list of all module metadata on a given app.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAllModuleMetadata(filterByModuleType?: ModuleType[]): Promise<ModuleMetadata[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter          | Type                                          | Description                                                       |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| filterByModuleType | [ModuleType](./sdk.moduletype.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional array of [ModuleType](./sdk.moduletype.md) to filter by. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ModuleMetadata](./sdk.modulemetadata.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Array of module metadata
